style.imagePromptTemplate: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, {weapon subject}, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire
style.languageNotes: Lean into clever, grounded descriptions; explain jargon in parenthesis when needed.

templates.name: Template Weapon
templates.description: Short 2025-friendly blurb explaining what it is in plain language.
templates.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, template weapon being tuned by laid-off tech workers, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: Lithium Lemming Stampede
weapons.description: Furloughed EV battery techs in 2025 Phoenix strap surplus Model Y packs onto protest delivery bots, wheel them into desert server farms, and trigger a cascading thermal runaway while livestream chat replays the DOE safety hearings.
weapons.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, jury-rigged battery cart sparking outside data hub, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: Chiller Kraken Siphon
weapons.description: HVAC contractors furloughed after the 2025 efficiency layoffs reroute bulk coolant trucks through a fake maintenance ticket, starving the desert campus chillers while laughing about the DOE fine schedule on Slack.
weapons.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, improvised coolant hose rerouting data chiller, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: Fiber Harpoon Winch
weapons.description: Laid-off fiber crews weld a tow hook to a rideshare winch, snagging trunk lines from the 2025 Google trench and yanking them into a puddle while union TikTok narrates the outage.
weapons.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, workers winching fiber bundles from manhole, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: Server Rattler Jackhammers
weapons.description: Night-shift construction crews paid in crypto run their 2025 surplus jackhammers along the slab, vibrating the racks loose while the county noise monitor pings every resident.
weapons.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, night crew jackhammering beside humming server hall, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: Greywater Ion Fog
weapons.description: Water-rights organizers reroute Scottsdale greywater trucks into a portable ionizer, fogging the 2025 cooling stacks until static discharge trips the breakers and AZDOT tweets about traffic delays.
weapons.imagePrompt: retro futurist protest poster, screenprint texture, light cyan and persimmon palette, activists venting ionized fog at cooling towers, dynamic perspective, simple shapes, minimal text, 2025 dystopian satire

weapons.name: UPS Overclock Trike
